references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of diffusion probabilistic models, introducing the core concepts and techniques used in many subsequent works, including this one.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the superior performance of diffusion models compared to GANs for image synthesis, motivating further research and development in the field.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the use of latent diffusion models for high-resolution image synthesis, a significant advancement in the field that is relevant to the methods explored in this work.

references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive analysis of the design space of diffusion models, offering valuable insights into the key factors affecting their performance and guiding future improvements.

references.paper_title: Masked autoencoders are scalable vision learners
references.reason: This paper introduces the masked autoencoder (MAE) framework, which has been widely adopted in self-supervised learning for computer vision tasks and is foundational to several methods used for masked image reconstruction within diffusion models.
